0E83D85543B94867016FC1B2BC67DE59: A campfire that can trigger channels and heal nearby players.
3BC2217C4E07939EBAC6588CEAD21530: A campfire that can trigger channels and heal nearby players.
4E203B1B4CB8A90E787B608D0763EB29: A campfire that can trigger channels and heal nearby players.
89B7170A443673ABBD82B0A5AD702CB6: A campfire that can trigger channels and heal nearby players.
BE90164E4031867B5245F28994AA1104: A campfire that can trigger channels and heal nearby players.
CA892D2B444AFD57C03EFAB494C5301A: A campfire that can trigger channels and heal nearby players.
E25A52DC44A22276BB7D8B916AC20044: A campfire that can trigger channels and heal nearby players.
AB7DE9574421839DBE8CE7A8B8EDDAA5: Campfire will extinguish when receiving from this channel.
DF78CEDE478EB5A9104C808E0AF66F24: Campfire will light when receiving from this channel.
5E7D3F5041D8081596F0F0AFB34D6D7F: Disable the Device when receiving from this channel.
CEF10628412604A26FA9B19F4055CC89: Enable the Device when receiving from this channel.
492CE27344732ADC55724192577CA16A: For each player affected by a campfire pulse, transmit on this channel.
0194F4CE4998C0A860453E9D3FBA5490: When a player enters the campfire area, transmit on this channel.
F60E3DA64D9746D3A3B697AEF7D4CDAB: When a player leaves the campfire area, transmit on this channel.
EAB029594F6F92D834D23183DA49117A: When campfire is extinguished, transmit on this channel.
253BF25F410CFCFE7B8923A5DFA32DA4: When campfire is lit, transmit on this channel.
E64C7F8942C7D288848FF192742E760F: When disabled, transmit on this channel.
9412F69249420AD51041A193B631E495: When enabled, transmit on this channel.
26D5438246E5634245ECAF9096BEA862: When the lit campfire pulses, transmit on this channel.

UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.CanAffectVehicles.Desc: Allows vehicles to trigger campfire events and be affected by pulse.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.AIDamagePerPulse.Descr: Amount of damage dealt per second to each affected AI within range.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.HealthPerPulse.Descrip: Amount of health gained per second by each player within range.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.WoodConsumptionPerPuls: Amount of wood used per second to keep the campfire lit.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.Extinguish.Description: Campfire will extinguish when receiving from this channel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.Light.Description: Campfire will light when receiving from this channel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.AffectsAI.Description: Determines how the Campfire should affect Creatures and Wildlife Predators that enter the area. Tamed Wildlife will not be affected.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.AffectsCreaturesOption: Determines how the Campfire should affect Creatures that enter the area. This setting will override Affects AI if set.
Determines how the Campfire should affect Wildlife Predators that enter the area. This setting will override Affects AI if set. Tamed Wildlife will not be affected.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.CanBeStoked.Descriptio: Determines if more fuel can be added to the Campfire while it is lit.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.EnabledDuringPhase.Des: Determines the game phases during which the device will be enabled. Pre-Game includes all phases prior to the Game starting (the waiting for players lobby on Featured Islands and the Game Start Countdown).
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.Disable.Description: Disable the Device when receiving from this channel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.Enable.Description: Enable the Device when receiving from this channel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.UseAdvancedLighting.De: Enables advanced lighting on the campfire.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.On Player Pulsed.Descr: For each player affected by a campfire pulse, transmit on this channel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.InvertAffectedTeamSele: If set, the selected Affected Team is the only one that cannot be affected by the Device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.InvertInteractingTeamS: If set, the selected Interacting Team is the only one that cannot interact with the Device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.CampfireZoneSize.Descr: Size of the zone that affects Players and Hostile AI.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.Starting Wood.Descript: The amount of wood that the campfire starts with, capped to the value of "Max Wood Capacity".
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.WoodToAddOnTrigger.Des: The amount of wood to add to the campfire when the "Add Wood When Receiving On" channel is triggered.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.InteractingClass.Descr: The class that is allowed to interact with the campfire.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.AffectedClass.Descript: The class that will be affected by the campfire's pulse.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.TimeToExtinguish.Descr: The length of time it takes to extinguish the campfire.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.TimeToLight.Descriptio: The length of time it takes to light the campfire.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.MaxWoodCapacity.Descri: The maximum wood capacity that the campfire can take.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.InteractingTeam.Descri: The team that is allowed to interact with the campfire.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.AffectedTeam.Descripti: The team that will be affected by the campfire's pulse.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.PulseInterval.Descript: The time duration between campfire Pulses.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.On Entering Area.Descr: When a player enters the campfire area, transmit on this channel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.On Leaving Area.Descri: When a player leaves the campfire area, transmit on this channel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.On Extinguished.Descri: When campfire is extinguished, transmit on this channel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.On Lit.Description: When campfire is lit, transmit on this channel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.On Disabled.Descriptio: When disabled, transmit on this channel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.On Enabled.Description: When enabled, transmit on this channel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.On Campfire Pulse.Desc: When the lit campfire pulses, transmit on this channel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.CanBeExtinguished.Desc: Whether or not the campfire can be extinguished by interacting with it.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.CanBeLit.Description: Whether or not the campfire can be lit by interacting with it.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.StartLit.Description: Whether or not the campfire is lit from the start of the match.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.UsesWood.Description: Whether or not the campfire requires wood to be used.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Campfire_C.Add Wood.Description: Wood will be added to the fire equal to the value set in "Wood To Add On Trigger" when receiving from this channel.
